title: [504. Base 7](https://leetcode.cn/problems/base-7/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
504. Base 7 Description Given an integer num, return a string of its base 7 representation.
 
Example 1:
Input: num = 100 Output: "202" Example 2:
Input: num = -7 Output: "-10"  
Constraints:
-107 <= num <= 107 Related Topics Math Similar Questions
